body:
Tips on how to run a #lean #startup 🧵
#buildinpublic

👇

[Pro tip]

If you’re working in a Startup and think it’ll be successful then during appraisal ask for more esops than raise.

My top #3 hiring tips if you're applying to fast-growing startups:

1/ show proof of work (aka things you've built)

2/ highlight specific examples where you've previously done what the job description lists as duties/responsibilities 

3/ talk to others who *just got* hired

Looking for any hints and tips for startup founders on where to find tech developers early on.. seems to be an increasingly difficult and more expensive task....
@AwakenHub @iamstartacus @WomenTechmakers @NIDevConf @DigitalDNAHQ

Pro tip for startups and early stage brands:

Having a transparent logo indexed on Google Image Search will make me 1000% more likely to include you in a deck.

I will not allow a black/white box to disrupt my slide aesthetic.

Feeling overwhelmed. Any tips, advices?

#startups #college
🤔 Asking for a founder: any tips on how to sell to the government as an early stage bootstrapped pre-revenue startup?

Are u starting a startup?
Have u worked in a startup?

Tip: Join a small startup (< 10 emp. for 6 months at least).

Why?
To unlearn all the big company habits which are liabilities in a startup. Learn how to make decisions in minutes that take months in a large company.

Yes?

10 Things I like to tweet the most about 👇🏻

1. Web Development
2. ReactJS
3. Nocode tools
4. Tech tips and tricks 
5. Nocode Hacks to make your life better
6. SaaS
7. Startups
8. Life lessons
9. Productivity
10. Growth Hacks

What about you?
Here is a short thread on five key tips for building your business to be anti-fragile as some politicians plan their destructive onslaught on startups and the digital economy

#NoteToSelf don't fly to the opposite ends of the country in the same week to attend conferences. 🥺

#emails #startups #tips

Having trouble finding and building a team for my startup idea. 

Any tips on this?
Tip: DO NOT try to bring some startup analogy to what’s happening in Kabul

That wraps it up! Do you have any tips for career growth? I’d love to hear them.

For more content on how to grow your career, startup, or community, follow me @chriscantino. 👋

Feeling lost when searching for new startup ideas? 

Here’s a tip that helps me: Electric light bulb

Jot down the unnecessarily hard things you’ve done in the last 2 years 

And see if you can help others skip steps or suffer less 

People will pay premium

I consulted for a U.S cannabis startup who were going to get acquired. The deal pulled through and the exit was sizable. 

Aside from my fee, these people sent me a fat $$$$ tip. Cannabis and marijuana money is blood money.

Super flex startup tonight. 12tm. PPR. Any last minute tips? Drafting at 1.02
@MyFantasyLeague @SleeperHQ

Hiring tip: offer paid test projects.

You’ll attract driven and curious people to work at your startup.

Test projects help you understand work style, attention to detail, and how they think.

My no#1 early stage founder tip: 

Your startup is dead by default (to people who have millions of things going in their lives) 

It is your job daily to resurrect it & make it worth remembering by telling stories, building in public, offering value etc

A few tips on building enterprise startups – healthcare, big co. tools, etc.

📈 The sales uptick won’t come until year six
🙄 Don’t be a subject matter snob
🤝 Everyone has to sell
📜 Pick VCs with long track records
🧑‍🎓 Prepare to teach
🐌 Move slowly and get buy-in

/🧵
After reviewing 500+ pitch decks/memos in the past few months from startups for @OverlookedVC, I have a few tips on how to stand out... [THREAD]

3 Steps of Growth Hacking strategy when you're building #startups or #business brand from scratch without any #digital online presence before
P.S. If you have own tips or tricks of #growth #hacking experience or #distribution, please share it into the comments

Reply and share your tips for working together successfully.
